txt.en:
'You have been a great help to us here, [placeholder], but my cousin Eiláf is facing a whole different set of problems up to the north and might have need for your help as well. He is helping to oversee a small outpost we have built there. It is called Myrkworth, and it rests within Imlad Balchorth.

'If you wish to continue to help us, travel to Myrkworth and find my cousin Eiláf. Myrkworth lies north of here atop a high hill in that treacherous land.

'Oh, and if you do make it to Myrkworth, give Eiláf my regards!'

'Ah, Hwati sent you, did he? A good, solid dwarf, he is! I haven't seen him in far too many days. But there is time for talk when the work is done....

'While Orcs and trolls are an immediate threat to Gabilshathûr, Angmar's Dead are a more subtle and dangerous one. We dwarves have come here to try to find a way to counter this threat.

'Speak to Gautar, Birgir, or Oflár and see if there is something they have for you to do. Perhaps in time, I may have a task for you as well.'
'My cousin Eiláf can be found in Myrkworth, which lies atop a high hill to the north, in Imlad Balchorth. Beware those lands, for Angmar's Dead walk the earth there!'
Hwati in Gabilshathûr thinks his cousin to the north in Myrkworth may have need for your help.
Myrkworth lies in Imlad Balchorth atop a high hill, north of Gabilshathûr.\n\nHwati has asked you to travel to Myrkworth and speak with his cousin, Eiláf.
